name: Furry Pinball
description:
Welcome to Furry Pinball!
  • THIS GAME IS A WORK IN PROGRESS! :O
  • For now there's just one table (Snowfox) and a barebones UI.
  • It plays much smoother on desktop, but you can also play in a browser.
  • If you like what you see or find any bugs, please let me know in the comments!

I'm aiming to create a whole set of animal-themed pinball tables while using this project to learn Unity 3d concepts and workflows. It's been hella fun so far and I have lots of ideas for tables!

Snowfox table:

Play as a fox pouncing prey in an icy winter landscape. Finish all the hunts (missions) and hone your skills (targets) to light up the pawprints! Can you find the vixen and start a family?

Update 2021 04 03 added Astral re-skin, press [T] in the menu to select it!

Controls: PlungerEnter
Mouse 1FlippersS / L
Mouse 1 / Mouse 2ResetR
Tilt Left/Right/Up
D / K / Space

Camera (during play)
C

Behind-the-scenes are available on Subscribestar and  Patreon. Donations are appreciated, but this game is free to play! <3

Let me know what you think! ^.^
